job.title: Software Development Engineer III
job.description:
Do what you love. Love what you do.

At Workday, we help the world’s largest organizations adapt to what’s next by bringing finance, HR, and planning into a single enterprise cloud. We work hard, and we’re serious about what we do. But we like to have fun, too. We put people first, celebrate diversity, drive innovation, and do good in the communities where we live and work.

About the Team
As part of the Operations Engineering organization at Workday, we are the team that builds and maintains the tooling, infrastructure and frameworks that enables our UI development teams to build, test and deliver quality products.
About the Role

 We are looking for a Software Development Engineer to join the Test Engineering team and our growing DevOps organization. You will partner with internal teams at Workday to build CI/CD pipelines and support automation infrastructure needs.
  • Build and maintain CI/CD pipeline infrastructure.
  • Build and maintain test automation frameworks.
  • Participate in all phases of the delivery life-cycle, including development, build, test automation and release.
  • Support automation of solutions for monitoring and reporting processes.
  • Participate in coordination of on-call internal support and monitoring.

About You

 Are you passionate about automation? Do you enjoy building out infrastructure to support internal developers? If this sounds like a match for you, we’d love to talk to you!
  • 4+ years experience in a Development, Automation or DevOps role.
  • Hands-on experience with programming languages like Java, Python or JavaScript.
  • Working knowledge of CI tools like Bamboo or Jenkins.
  • Preference for familiarity with Selenium/WebDriver or other UI automation tools.
  • Bonus points for experience with AWS,Docker, K8s, Lambda or Terraform .

Workday is an Equal Opportunity Employer including individuals with disabilities and protected veterans.
